nodes.text: The Peregrine-240 was a model of swoop produced by Aratech Repulsor Company during the last years of the Galactic Republic.
The Peregrine-240 swoop measured 3.25 meters in length, and could accommodate a pilot and a single passenger. It could attain speeds in excess of 350 kilometers per hour under ideal conditions.
The Peregrine-240 swoop was incorrectly referred to as the Peregrine-340 in Star Wars Gamer, issue 4.
